articles.title: WGA members overwhelmingly ratify new deal with Hollywood studios, officially ending strike - KABC-TV
articles.description: Members of the Writers Guild of America overwhelmingly ratified a new labor contract with Hollywood studios, closing the book on a strike that helped bring film and TV production to a halt.
articles.content: LOS ANGELES (KABC) -- Members of the Writers Guild of America overwhelmingly ratified a new labor contract with Hollywood studios, the union announced Monday, closing the book on a strike that helped… [+1408 chars]

articles.title: What is Cardiovascular-Kidney-Metabolic Syndrome? What to Know - Healthline
articles.description: Officials from the American Heart Association say that multiple chronic conditions can be defined as a new syndrome called cardiovascular-kidney-metabolic syndrome or CKM.
articles.content:
• The American Heart Association has released a new advisory regarding a new type of condition related to heart, kidney and metabolic disorders.

articles.title: Tracing Footprints: Humans Got to America 7,000 Years Earlier Than Thought - SciTechDaily
articles.description: New research, supported by advanced dating techniques, suggests that humans settled in the Americas around 23,000 years ago, challenging earlier beliefs of a 14,000-year timeline. When and how humans first settled in the Americas is a subject of considerable …
